snippet: A Taste of Long Island, an 800-square-foot kitchen with a 400-square-foot shop in Farmingdale, gives entrepreneurs space to cook in shifts and to sell their products.
abstract: Taste of Long Island, 800-square-foot kitchen with 400-square-foot shop in Farmingdale, gives entrepreneurs space in which they can cook in shifts as well as sell their products (Metropolitan/Long Island).
